name: @asgardeo/choreo-react-express
description: React and Express based sample fullstack app to demonstrate Asgardeo / WSO2 Identity Server Express SDK usage

scripts.prebuild: curr_dir=$(pwd) && npm run install:client && cd $curr_dir && npm run install:server
scripts.build: curr_dir=$(pwd) && yarn build:client && cd $curr_dir && npm run build:server
